001package io.jstach.jstachio.spi;
002
003import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
004
005import java.lang.System.Logger;
006import java.lang.System.Logger.Level;
007import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
008import java.lang.reflect.AnnotatedElement;
009import java.lang.reflect.Constructor;
010import java.nio.charset.Charset;
011import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
012import java.nio.charset.UnsupportedCharsetException;
013import java.util.Arrays;
014import java.util.EnumSet;
015import java.util.List;
016import java.util.Map;
017import java.util.Map.Entry;
018import java.util.NoSuchElementException;
019import java.util.Objects;
020import java.util.ServiceConfigurationError;
021import java.util.ServiceLoader;
022import java.util.Set;
023import java.util.Spliterators.AbstractSpliterator;
024import java.util.function.Consumer;
025import java.util.function.Function;
026import java.util.stream.Stream;
027import java.util.stream.StreamSupport;
028
029import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
030
031import io.jstach.jstache.JStache;
032import io.jstach.jstache.JStacheConfig;
033import io.jstach.jstache.JStacheContentType;
034import io.jstach.jstache.JStacheContentType.UnspecifiedContentType;
035import io.jstach.jstache.JStacheFormatter;
036import io.jstach.jstache.JStacheFormatter.UnspecifiedFormatter;
037import io.jstach.jstache.JStacheName;
038import io.jstach.jstache.JStachePath;
039import io.jstach.jstachio.JStachio;
040import io.jstach.jstachio.Output.EncodedOutput;
041import io.jstach.jstachio.Template;

050/**
051 *
052 * Locates generated templates by their model via reflection.
053 * <p>
054 * This utility class is useful if you plan on implementing your own {@link JStachio} and
055 * or other integrations.
056 *
057 * @apiNote In order to use reflection in a modular setup one must <code>open</code>
058 * packages to the {@link io.jstach.jstachio/ } module.
059 * @author agentgt
060 *
061 */
062public final class Templates {
063
064        private Templates() {
065        }
066
067        /**
068         * A utility method that will check if the templates encoding matches the outputs
069         * encoding.
070         * @param template template charset to check
071         * @param output an encoded output expecting the template charset to be the same.
072         * @throws UnsupportedCharsetException if the charsets do not match
073         */
074        public static void validateEncoding(TemplateInfo template, EncodedOutput<?> output) {
075                if (!template.templateCharset().equals(output.charset())) {
076                        throw new UnsupportedCharsetException(
077                                        "The encoding of the template does not match the output. template charset="
078                                                        + template.templateCharset() + ", output charset=" + output.charset());
079                }
080        }
081
082        /**
083         * Finds a {@link Template} if possible otherwise falling back to a
084         * {@link TemplateInfo} based on annotation metadata. A call first resolves the type
085         * that is actually annotated with JStache and then effectively calls
086         * {@link #getTemplate(Class)} first and if that fails possibly tries
087         * {@link #getInfoByReflection(Class)} based on config.
088         * @apiNote Callers can do an <code>instanceof Template t</code> to see if a generated
089         * template was returned instead of the fallback.
090         * @param modelType the models class (<em>the one annotated with {@link JStache} and
091         * not the Templates class</em>)
092         * @param config config used to determine whether or not to fallback
093         * @return the template info which might be a {@link Template} if the generated
094         * template was found.
095         * @throws Exception if any reflection error happes or the template is not found
096         */
097        public static TemplateInfo findTemplate(Class<?> modelType, JStachioConfig config) throws Exception {
098                Logger logger = config.getLogger(Templates.class.getName());
099                return findTemplate(modelType, config, logger);
100        }
101
102        /**
103         * Finds a {@link Template} if possible otherwise falling back to a
104         * {@link TemplateInfo} based on annotation metadata. A call first resolves the type
105         * that is actually annotated with JStache and then effectively calls
106         * {@link #getTemplate(Class)} first and if that fails possibly tries
107         * {@link #getInfoByReflection(Class)} based on config. Unlike
108         * {@link #findTemplate(Class, JStachioConfig)} this call will not produce any logging
109         * and will not throw an exception if it fails.
110         * @apiNote Callers can do an <code>instanceof Template t</code> to see if a generated
111         * template was returned instead of the fallback.
112         * @param modelType the models class (<em>the one annotated with {@link JStache} and
113         * not the Templates class</em>)
114         * @param config config used to determine whether or not to fallback
115         * @return the template info which might be a {@link Template} if the generated
116         * template was found or <code>null</code> if not found.
117         */
118        public static @Nullable TemplateInfo findTemplateOrNull(Class<?> modelType, JStachioConfig config) {
119                if (isIgnoredType(modelType)) {
120                        return null;
121                }
122                try {
123                        return findTemplate(modelType, config, JStachioConfig.noopLogger());
124                }
125                catch (Exception e) {
126                        return null;
127                }
128        }
129
130        /**
131         * Checks to see if the model type is a type that is always ignored for faster
132         * {@link JStachioTemplateFinder#supportsType(Class)} checking.
133         *
134         * TODO possible candidate for public on minor release
135         * @param modelType the jstache annotated type
136         * @return <code>true</code> if the type should be ignored.
137         */
138        static boolean isIgnoredType(Class<?> modelType) {
139                /*
140                 * TODO JMH as this method will be called quite frequently
141                 */
142                if (modelType == String.class || modelType == Map.class || modelType == Object.class) {
143                        return true;
144                }
145                if (modelType.isPrimitive()) {
146                        return true;
147                }
148                if (modelType.getName().startsWith("java.")) {
149                        return true;
150                }
151                return false;
152        }
153
154        /**
155         * Finds the closest JStache annotation on this class or parent classes (super and
156         * interfaces).
157         *
158         * TODO possible candidate to make public on minor release
159         * @param c the model type to search on.
160         * @return a tuple of found class annotated and the jstache annotation.
161         */
162        static Entry<Class<?>, JStache> findJStache(final Class<?> modelType) {
163                var jstache = findJStacheOrNull(modelType);
164                if (jstache == null) {
165                        throw new TemplateNotFoundException("JStache annotation was not found on type or parents.", modelType);
166                }
167                return jstache;
168        }
169
170        /**
171         * Finds the closest JStache annotation on this class or parent classes (super and
172         * interfaces).
173         *
174         * TODO possible candidate to make public on minor release
175         * @param c the model type to search on.
176         * @return a tuple of found class annotated and the jstache annotation.
177         */
178        static @Nullable Entry<Class<?>, JStache> findJStacheOrNull(final Class<?> modelType) {
179                if (isIgnoredType(modelType))
180                        return null;
181                return Stream.concat(parents(modelType), interfaces(modelType)) //
182                                .filter(_c -> !isIgnoredType(_c)) //
183                                .filter(_c -> _c.getDeclaredAnnotation(JStache.class) != null) //
184                                .map(_c -> Map.<Class<?>, JStache>entry(_c, _c.getDeclaredAnnotation(JStache.class))) //
185                                .findFirst() //
186                                .orElse(null);
187        }
188
189        static TemplateInfo findTemplate(Class<?> modelType, JStachioConfig config, Logger logger) throws Exception {
190
191                var resolvedType = findJStache(modelType).getKey();
192
193                EnumSet<TemplateLoadStrategy> strategies = EnumSet.noneOf(TemplateLoadStrategy.class);
194
195                for (var s : ALL_STRATEGIES) {
196                        if (s.isEnabled(config)) {
197                                strategies.add(s);
198                        }
199                }
200                var classLoaders = collectClassLoaders(modelType.getClassLoader());
201
202                Exception error;
203                try {
204                        Template<?> r = Templates.getTemplate(resolvedType, strategies, classLoaders, logger);
205                        return r;
206                }
207                catch (Exception e) {
208                        error = e;
209                }
210                if (!config.getBoolean(JStachioConfig.REFLECTION_TEMPLATE_DISABLE)) {
211                        if (logger.isLoggable(Level.WARNING)) {
212                                String message = String
213                                                .format("Could not find generated template and will try reflection for model type:"
214                                                                + "'%s', annotated type: '%s'", modelType, resolvedType);
215                                logger.log(Level.WARNING, message, error);
216                        }
217                        return getInfoByReflection(resolvedType);
218
219                }
220                throw error;
221
222        }
223
224        /**
225         * Finds template info by accessing JStache annotations through reflective lookup.
226         * <p>
227         * This allows you to lookup template meta data <strong>regardless of whether or not
228         * the annotation processor has generated code</strong>. This method is mainly used
229         * for fallback mechanisms and extensions.
230         * <p>
231         * Why might you need the reflective data instead of the static generated meta data?
232         * Well often times the annotation processor in a hot reload environment such as
233         * JRebel, JBoss modules, or Spring Reload has not generated the code from a JStache
234         * model and or it is not desired. This allows reflection based engines like JMustache
235         * to keep working even if code is not generated.
236         * @param modelType the class that is annotated with {@link JStache}
237         * @return template info meta data
238         * @throws Exception if any reflection error happes or the template is not found
239         */
240        public static TemplateInfo getInfoByReflection(Class<?> modelType) throws Exception {
241                return TemplateInfos.templateOf(modelType);
242        }
243
244        /**
245         * Finds a template by reflection or an exception is thrown.
246         * @param <T> the model type
247         * @param clazz the model type
248         * @return the template never <code>null</code>.
249         * @throws NoSuchElementException if the template is not found
250         * @throws Exception if the template is not found or any reflective access errors
251         */
252        public static <T> Template<T> getTemplate(Class<T> clazz) throws Exception {
253                List<ClassLoader> classLoaders = collectClassLoaders(clazz.getClassLoader());
254                return getTemplate(clazz, ALL_STRATEGIES, classLoaders, JStachioConfig.noopLogger());
255        }
256
257        /**
258         * Finds a template by reflection or an exception is thrown. <em>Because the return
259         * template is parameterized a template matching the exact type is returned and
260         * inheritance either via interfaces or super class is not checked!</em>
261         * @param <T> the model type
262         * @param modelType the model type
263         * @param strategies load strategies
264         * @param classLoaders class loaders to try loading
265         * @param logger used to log attempted strategies. If you do not want to log use
266         * {@link JStachioConfig#noopLogger()}.
267         * @return the template never <code>null</code>.
268         * @throws NoSuchElementException if the template is not found
269         * @throws Exception if the template is not found or any reflective access errors
270         *
271         */
272        public static <T> Template<T> getTemplate(Class<T> modelType, Iterable<TemplateLoadStrategy> strategies,
273                        Iterable<ClassLoader> classLoaders, System.Logger logger) throws Exception {
274                for (TemplateLoadStrategy s : strategies) {
275                        if (logger.isLoggable(Level.DEBUG)) {
276                                logger.log(Level.DEBUG, "For modelType: \"" + modelType + "\" trying strategy: \"" + s + "\"");
277                        }
278                        for (ClassLoader classLoader : classLoaders) {
279                                try {
280                                        Template<T> template = s.load(modelType, classLoader, logger);
281                                        if (template != null) {
282                                                return template;
283                                        }
284                                }
285                                catch (ClassNotFoundException | TemplateNotFoundException e) {
286                                        continue;
287                                }
288                        }
289                }
290                throw new TemplateNotFoundException(modelType);
291        }
292
293        static boolean isReflectionTemplate(TemplateInfo template) {
294                if (template instanceof SimpleTemplateInfo si) {
295                        return true;
296                }
297                return false;
298        }
299
300        private static final Set<TemplateLoadStrategy> ALL_STRATEGIES = EnumSet.allOf(TemplateLoadStrategy.class);
301
302        /**
303         * Strategy to load templates dynamically. <em>These strategies expect the exact type
304         * and not a super type!</em>
305         *
306         * @author agentgt
307         *
308         */
309        public enum TemplateLoadStrategy {
310
311                /**
312                 * Strategy that will try the {@link ServiceLoader} with the SPI of
313                 * {@link TemplateProvider}.
314                 */
315                SERVICE_LOADER() {
316                        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
317                        @Override
318                        protected <T> @Nullable Template<T> load(Class<T> clazz, ClassLoader classLoader, System.Logger logger)
319                                        throws Exception {
320                                return (Template<T>) templateByServiceLoader(clazz, classLoader, logger);
321                        }
322
323                        @Override
324                        protected final boolean isEnabled(JStachioConfig config) {
325                                return !config.getBoolean(JStachioConfig.SERVICELOADER_TEMPLATE_DISABLE);
326                        }
327                },
328                /**
329                 * Strategy that will try no-arg constructor
330                 */
331                CONSTRUCTOR() {
332                        @Override
333                        protected <T> @Nullable Template<T> load(Class<T> clazz, ClassLoader classLoader, System.Logger logger)
334                                        throws Exception {
335                                return templateByConstructor(clazz, classLoader);
336                        }
337
338                        @Override
339                        protected final boolean isEnabled(JStachioConfig config) {
340                                return !config.getBoolean(JStachioConfig.REFLECTION_TEMPLATE_DISABLE);
341                        }
342
343                };
344
345                /**
346                 * Load the template by this strategy.
347                 * @param <T> model type.
348                 * @param clazz model type.
349                 * @param classLoader classload which may more may not be used.
350                 * @param logger used to log reflection warnings or other errors.
351                 * @return loaded template
352                 * @throws Exception if an error happens while trying to load template.
353                 */
354                protected abstract <T> @Nullable Template<T> load(Class<T> clazz, ClassLoader classLoader, System.Logger logger)
355                                throws Exception;
356
357                /**
358                 * Determine if the strategy is enabled.
359                 * @param config key value config
360                 * @return true if not disabled.
361                 */
362                protected abstract boolean isEnabled(JStachioConfig config);
363
364        }
365
366        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
367        private static <T> @Nullable Template<T> templateByConstructor(Class<T> clazz, ClassLoader classLoader)
368                        throws Exception {
369                Class<?> implementation = classLoader.loadClass(generatedClassName(clazz));
370                Constructor<?> constructor = implementation.getDeclaredConstructor();
371                constructor.setAccessible(true);
372                return (Template<T>) constructor.newInstance();
373        }
374
375        /**
376         * Gets the canonical class name of the generated template code regardless of whether
377         * or not code has actually been generated. Because the class may not have been
378         * generated the return is a String.
379         * @param modelClass the exact model class that contains the {@link JStache}
380         * annotation.
381         * @return the FQN class name of the would be generated template code
382         * @throws NoSuchElementException if the model class is not annotated with
383         * {@link JStache}.
384         */
385        public static String generatedClassName(Class<?> modelClass) {
386                // TODO perhaps this information should be on TemplateInfo?
387                var a = modelClass.getAnnotation(JStache.class);
388                if (a == null) {
389                        throw new TemplateNotFoundException(modelClass);
390                }
391                String cname;
392                if (a == null || a.name().isBlank()) {
393
394                        // @SuppressWarnings("null") // Eclipse bug with annotation arrays
395                        JStacheName name = findAnnotations(modelClass, JStacheConfig.class) //
396                                        .flatMap(config -> Arrays.stream(config.naming())).findFirst().orElse(null);
397
398                        String prefix = name == null ? JStacheName.UNSPECIFIED : name.prefix();
399
400                        String suffix = name == null ? JStacheName.UNSPECIFIED : name.suffix();
401
402                        prefix = prefix.equals(JStacheName.UNSPECIFIED) ? JStacheName.DEFAULT_PREFIX : prefix;
403                        suffix = suffix.equals(JStacheName.UNSPECIFIED) ? JStacheName.DEFAULT_SUFFIX : suffix;
404
405                        cname = prefix + modelClass.getSimpleName() + suffix;
406                }
407                else {
408                        cname = a.name();
409                }
410                String packageName = modelClass.getPackageName();
411                String fqn = packageName + (packageName.isEmpty() ? "" : ".") + cname;
412                return fqn;
413        }
414
415        private static Charset resolveCharset(Class<?> c) {
416                String charset = findAnnotations(c, JStacheConfig.class).map(config -> config.charset())
417                                .filter(cs -> !cs.isEmpty()).findFirst().orElse(null);
418                if (charset == null) {
419                        return StandardCharsets.UTF_8;
420                }
421                return Charset.forName(charset);
422        }
423
424        static <A extends Annotation> Stream<A> findAnnotations(Class<?> c, Class<A> annotationClass) {
425                var s = annotationElements(c);
426                return s.filter(p -> p != null).flatMap(p -> Stream.ofNullable(p.getAnnotation(annotationClass)));
427        }
428
429        private static Stream<? extends AnnotatedElement> annotationElements(Class<?> c) {
430                Stream<? extends AnnotatedElement> enclosing = enclosing(c).flatMap(Templates::expandUsing);
431                return Stream.<Stream<? extends AnnotatedElement>>builder().add(enclosing)
432                                .add(Stream.ofNullable(c.getPackage())).add(Stream.ofNullable(c.getModule())).build()
433                                .flatMap(Function.identity());
434        }
435
436        /*
437         * This is to get referenced config of JStacheConfig.using
438         */
439        private static Stream<Class<?>> expandUsing(Class<?> e) {
440
441                JStacheConfig config = e.getAnnotation(JStacheConfig.class);
442                if (config == null) {
443                        return Stream.of(e);
444                }
445                var using = config.using();
446                if (!using.equals(void.class)) {
447                        return Stream.of(e, using);
448                }
449                return Stream.of(e);
450        }
451
452        private static Stream<Class<?>> enclosing(Class<?> e) {
453                return findClasses(e, Class::getEnclosingClass);
454        }
455
456        private static Stream<Class<?>> parents(Class<?> e) {
457                return findClasses(e, Class::getSuperclass);
458        }
459
460        private static Stream<Class<?>> interfaces(Class<?> clazz) {
461                return Stream.concat(Stream.of(clazz.getInterfaces()),
462                                Stream.of(clazz.getInterfaces()).flatMap(interfaceClass -> interfaces(interfaceClass)));
463        }
464
465        private static Stream<Class<?>> findClasses(Class<?> e, Function<Class<?>, @Nullable Class<?>> f) {
466                AbstractSpliterator<Class<?>> split = new AbstractSpliterator<Class<?>>(Long.MAX_VALUE, 0) {
467                        @Nullable
468                        Class<?> current = e;
469
470                        @Override
471                        public boolean tryAdvance(Consumer<? super Class<?>> action) {
472                                Class<?> c;
473                                if ((c = current) == null) {
474                                        return false;
475                                }
476                                current = f.apply(c);
477                                action.accept(c);
478                                return true;
479                        }
480                };
481                return StreamSupport.stream(split, false);
482        }
483
484        private static <T> @Nullable Template<?> templateByServiceLoader(Class<T> clazz, ClassLoader classLoader,
485                        System.Logger logger) {
486                ServiceLoader<TemplateProvider> loader = ServiceLoader.load(TemplateProvider.class, classLoader);
487                return findTemplates(loader, TemplateConfig.empty(), e -> {
488                        logger.log(Level.ERROR, "Template provider failed to load. Skipping it.", e);
489                }).filter(t -> clazz.equals(t.modelClass())).findFirst().orElse(null);
490        }
491
492        /**
493         * Find templates by the given service loader.
494         * @param serviceLoader a prepared service loader
495         * @param templateConfig template config to use for instantiating templates
496         * @param errorHandler handle {@link ServiceConfigurationError} errors.
497         * @return lazy stream of templates
498         */
499        public static Stream<Template<?>> findTemplates( //
500                        ServiceLoader<TemplateProvider> serviceLoader, //
501                        TemplateConfig templateConfig, //
502                        Consumer<ServiceConfigurationError> errorHandler) {
503                return serviceLoader.stream().flatMap(p -> {
504                        try {
505                                return p.get().provideTemplates().stream();
506                        }
507                        catch (ServiceConfigurationError e) {
508                                errorHandler.accept(e);
509                        }
510                        return Stream.empty();
511                });
512        }
513
514        private static List<ClassLoader> collectClassLoaders(@Nullable ClassLoader classLoader) {
515                return Stream.<@Nullable ClassLoader>builder().add(classLoader)
516                                .add(Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader()).add(Template.class.getClassLoader()).build()
517                                .<ClassLoader>flatMap(s -> Stream.ofNullable(s)).toList();
518        }
519
520        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
521        static <E extends Throwable> void sneakyThrow(final Throwable x) throws E {
522                throw (E) x;
523        }
524
525        /**
526         * Resolve path lookup information reflectively from a model class by doing config
527         * resolution at runtime.
528         * @param model a class annotated with JStache
529         * @return the resolved path annotation
530         * @apiNote This method is an implementation detail for reflection rendering engines
531         * such as JMustache and JStachio's future reflection based engine. It is recommended
532         * you do not rely on it as it is subject to change in the future.
533         * @deprecated use {@link #getInfoByReflection(Class)} or {@link #getPathInfo(Class)}.
534         */
535        @Deprecated
536        public static @Nullable JStachePath resolvePath(Class<?> model) {
537                return _resolvePath(model);
538        }
539
540        /**
541         * <strong>INTERNAL (use at your own risk):</strong> Resolved {@link JStachePath}
542         * config by replacing {@link JStachePath#UNSPECIFIED} with default values. The passed
543         * in model class does not need be directly annotated with {@link JStache} and can be
544         * subclass.
545         * @param modelClass the model's class
546         * @return never <code>null</code> path information.
547         * @apiNote <strong>INTERNAL (use at your own risk):</strong> This method largely
548         * exists because {@link TemplateInfo} does not expose the original prefix and suffix
549         * used. The prefix and suffix are needed for reloading the templates for extensions.
550         * If you use this method please let the developers know and for what.
551         */
552        public static PathInfo getPathInfo(Class<?> modelClass) {
553                return DefaultPathInfo.of(modelClass, _resolvePath(modelClass));
554        }
555
556        private static @Nullable JStachePath _resolvePath(Class<?> model) {
557                // TODO perhaps this information should be on TemplateInfo?
558                return annotationElements(model) //
559                                .map(TemplateInfos::resolvePathOnElement) //
560                                .filter(p -> p != null) //
561                                .findFirst() //
562                                .orElse(null);
563        }
564
565        /**
566         * Resolved {@link JStachePath} config by replacing {@link JStachePath#UNSPECIFIED}
567         * with default values.
568         *
569         * @apiNote This interface largely exists because {@link TemplateInfo} does not expose
570         * the original prefix and suffix used.
571         * @author agentgt
572         */
573        public sealed interface PathInfo {
574
575                /**
576                 * Resolved prefix.
577                 * @return prefix maybe empty but will never be {@link JStachePath#UNSPECIFIED}.
578                 */
579                String prefix();
580
581                /**
582                 * Resolved suffix.
583                 * @return suffix maybe empty but will never be {@link JStachePath#UNSPECIFIED}.
584                 */
585                String suffix();
586
587                /**
588                 * Calculates the expanded path and if the supplied path is empty then the path
589                 * will be expanded based on the class name where package name are separated with
590                 * a slash ("{@code /}") instead of a "<code>.</code>" and is suffixed with
591                 * {@value JStachePath#AUTO_SUFFIX} if suffix is {@link JStachePath#UNSPECIFIED}.
592                 * @param path if the path is empty it will be calculated based on the modelClass
593                 * package name and class name.
594                 * @return fully resolved path with prefix and suffix.
595                 */
596                public String resolveFullPath(String path);
597
598        }
599
600        record DefaultPathInfo(Class<?> modelClass, String prefix, String suffix, //
601                        boolean prefixUnspecified, boolean suffixUnspecified //
602        ) implements PathInfo {
603
604                static DefaultPathInfo of(Class<?> modelClass, @Nullable JStachePath path) {
605                        String prefix, suffix;
606                        boolean prefixUnspecified, suffixUnspecified;
607                        if (path == null) {
608                                prefix = JStachePath.DEFAULT_PREFIX;
609                                suffix = JStachePath.DEFAULT_SUFFIX;
610                                prefixUnspecified = suffixUnspecified = true;
611                        }
612                        else {
613                                prefix = path.prefix();
614                                suffix = path.suffix();
615                                prefixUnspecified = JStachePath.UNSPECIFIED.equals(prefix);
616                                suffixUnspecified = JStachePath.UNSPECIFIED.equals(suffix);
617                                prefix = prefixUnspecified ? JStachePath.DEFAULT_PREFIX : prefix;
618                                suffix = suffixUnspecified ? JStachePath.DEFAULT_SUFFIX : suffix;
619                        }
620                        return new DefaultPathInfo(modelClass, requireNonNull(prefix), requireNonNull(suffix), prefixUnspecified,
621                                        suffixUnspecified);
622                }
623
624                public String resolveFullPath(String path) {
625                        String resolvePath;
626                        String prefix = prefix();
627                        String suffix = suffix();
628                        if (path.isEmpty()) {
629                                resolvePath = resolveDefaultPath(modelClass);
630                                if (suffixUnspecified()) {
631                                        suffix = JStachePath.AUTO_SUFFIX;
632                                }
633                        }
634                        else {
635                                resolvePath = path;
636                        }
637                        return prefix + resolvePath + suffix;
638
639                }
640
641                private static String resolveDefaultPath(Class<?> model) {
642                        String resolvedPath;
643                        String folder = model.getPackageName().replace('.', '/');
644                        folder = folder.isEmpty() ? folder : folder + "/";
645                        resolvedPath = folder + model.getSimpleName();
646                        return resolvedPath;
647                }
648        }
649
650        static class TemplateInfos {
651
652                public static TemplateInfo templateOf(Class<?> model) throws Exception {
653                        JStache stache = model.getAnnotation(JStache.class);
654                        if (stache == null) {
655                                throw new IllegalArgumentException(
656                                                "Model class is not annotated with " + JStache.class.getSimpleName() + ". class: " + model);
657                        }
658
659                        String templateString = stache.template();
660
661                        final String templateName = generatedClassName(model);
662                        String templatePath;
663                        if (!templateString.isEmpty()) {
664                                templatePath = "";
665                        }
666                        else {
667                                PathInfo pathInfo = getPathInfo(model);
668                                templatePath = pathInfo.resolveFullPath(requireNonNull(stache.path()));
669                        }
670
671                        var ee = EscaperProvider.INSTANCE.providesFromModelType(model, stache);
672                        Function<String, String> templateEscaper = ee.getValue();
673                        Class<?> templateContentType = ee.getKey();
674                        String templateMediaType = "";
675                        var jstacheContentType = templateContentType.getAnnotation(JStacheContentType.class);
676                        if (jstacheContentType != null) {
677                                templateMediaType = Objects.requireNonNull(jstacheContentType.mediaType());
678                        }
679                        Function<@Nullable Object, String> templateFormatter = FormatterProvider.INSTANCE
680                                        .providesFromModelType(model, stache).getValue();
681
682                        Charset templateCharset = resolveCharset(model);
683
684                        long lastLoaded = System.currentTimeMillis();
685                        return new SimpleTemplateInfo( //
686                                        templateName, //
687                                        templatePath, //
688                                        templateCharset, //
689                                        templateMediaType, //
690                                        templateString, //
691                                        templateContentType, //
692                                        templateEscaper, //
693                                        templateFormatter, //
694                                        lastLoaded, //
695                                        model);
696
697                }
698
699                private static @Nullable JStachePath resolvePathOnElement(AnnotatedElement a) {
700                        var path = a.getAnnotation(JStachePath.class);
701                        if (path != null) {
702                                return path;
703                        }
704                        var config = a.getAnnotation(JStacheConfig.class);
705                        if (config != null && config.pathing().length > 0) {
706                                return config.pathing()[0];
707                        }
708                        return null;
709                }
710
711                sealed interface StaticProvider<P> {
712
713                        private @Nullable Class<?> autoToNull(@Nullable Class<?> type) {
714                                if ((type == null) || type.equals(autoProvider())) {
715                                        return null;
716                                }
717                                return type;
718                        }
719
720                        default Class<?> nullToDefault(@Nullable Class<?> type) {
721                                Class<?> c = autoToNull(type);
722                                if (c == null) {
723                                        return defaultProvider();
724                                }
725                                return c;
726                        }
727
728                        String providesMethod(Class<?> type);
729
730                        Class<?> autoProvider();
731
732                        Class<?> defaultProvider();
733
734                        @Nullable
735                        Class<?> providerFromJStache(JStache jstache);
736
737                        Class<?> providerFromConfig(JStacheConfig config);
738
739                        default Class<?> findProvider(Class<?> modelType, JStache jstache) {
740                                @Nullable
741                                Class<?> provider = autoToNull(providerFromJStache(jstache));
742                                if (provider != null) {
743                                        return provider;
744                                }
745                                provider = findAnnotations(modelType, JStacheConfig.class)
746                                                .map(config -> autoToNull(providerFromConfig(config))).filter(p -> p != null).findFirst()
747                                                .orElse(null);
748                                return nullToDefault(provider);
749                        }
750
751                        default Entry<Class<?>, P> providesFromModelType(Class<?> modelType, JStache jstache) throws Exception {
752                                var t = findProvider(modelType, jstache);
753                                return Map.entry(t, Objects.requireNonNull(provides(t)));
754                        }
755
756                        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
757                        default P provides(Class<?> type) throws Exception {
758                                String provides = providesMethod(type);
759                                var method = type.getMethod(provides);
760                                Object r = method.invoke(provides);
761                                return (P) r;
762                        }
763
764                }
765
766                enum EscaperProvider implements StaticProvider<Function<String, String>> {
767
768                        INSTANCE;
769
770                        @Override
771                        public Class<?> autoProvider() {
772                                return UnspecifiedContentType.class;
773                        }
774
775                        @Override
776                        public Class<?> defaultProvider() {
777                                return Html.class;
778                        }
779
780                        @Override
781                        public @Nullable Class<?> providerFromJStache(JStache jstache) {
782                                return null;
783                        }
784
785                        @Override
786                        public Class<?> providerFromConfig(JStacheConfig config) {
787                                return Objects.requireNonNull(config.contentType());
788                        }
789
790                        @Override
791                        public String providesMethod(Class<?> type) {
792                                JStacheContentType a = type.getAnnotation(JStacheContentType.class);
793                                if (a == null) {
794                                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Specified content type class is not annotated with @"
795                                                        + JStacheContentType.class.getSimpleName());
796                                }
797                                return Objects.requireNonNull(a.providesMethod());
798                        }
799
800                        @Override
801                        public Function<String, String> provides(@Nullable Class<?> contentType) throws Exception {
802                                contentType = nullToDefault(contentType);
803                                if (contentType.equals(Html.class)) {
804                                        return Html.provider();
805                                }
806                                else if (contentType.equals(PlainText.class)) {
807                                        return PlainText.provider();
808                                }
809                                return StaticProvider.super.provides(contentType);
810                        }
811
812                }
813
814                enum FormatterProvider implements StaticProvider<Function<@Nullable Object, String>> {
815
816                        INSTANCE;
817
818                        @Override
819                        public Class<?> autoProvider() {
820                                return UnspecifiedFormatter.class;
821                        }
822
823                        @Override
824                        public Class<?> defaultProvider() {
825                                return DefaultFormatter.class;
826                        }
827
828                        @Override
829                        public @Nullable Class<?> providerFromJStache(JStache jstache) {
830                                return null;
831                        }
832
833                        @Override
834                        public Class<?> providerFromConfig(JStacheConfig config) {
835                                return Objects.requireNonNull(config.formatter());
836                        }
837
838                        @Override
839                        public String providesMethod(Class<?> type) {
840                                JStacheFormatter a = type.getAnnotation(JStacheFormatter.class);
841                                if (a == null) {
842                                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Specified formatter provider is not annotated with @"
843                                                        + JStacheFormatter.class.getSimpleName());
844                                }
845                                return Objects.requireNonNull(a.providesMethod());
846                        }
847
848                        @Override
849                        public Function<@Nullable Object, String> provides(@Nullable Class<?> formatterType) throws Exception {
850                                formatterType = nullToDefault(formatterType);
851                                if (formatterType.equals(DefaultFormatter.class)) {
852                                        return DefaultFormatter.provider();
853                                }
854                                else if (formatterType.equals(SpecFormatter.class)) {
855                                        return SpecFormatter.provider();
856                                }
857                                return StaticProvider.super.provides(formatterType);
858                        }
859
860                }
861
862                record SimpleTemplateInfo( //
863                                String templateName, //
864                                String templatePath, //
865                                Charset templateCharset, //
866                                String templateMediaType, //
867                                String templateString, //
868                                Class<?> templateContentType, //
869                                Function<String, String> templateEscaper, //
870                                Function<@Nullable Object, String> templateFormatter, //
871                                long lastLoaded, //
872                                Class<?> modelClass) implements TemplateInfo {
873
874                        @Override
875                        public boolean supportsType(Class<?> type) {
876                                return modelClass().isAssignableFrom(type);
877                        }
878
879                        @Override
880                        public Function<String, String> templateEscaper() {
881                                return this.templateEscaper;
882                        }
883
884                        @Override
885                        public Function<@Nullable Object, String> templateFormatter() {
886                                return this.templateFormatter;
887                        }
888
889                }
890
891        }
892
893}
